location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter relates to the auditing of the accounts of the Residency from September 1823 to October 1825. The letter also refers to the pay of Assistant Surgeon James Pringle Riach; and the acceptance by the Resident of various accounting methods detailed by the Auditor.
